bibl.title: Linguistic Diversity in the Archive of the Engineers Kleon and Theodoros.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Private correspondence. - 3. ἵνα and ὅπως. - 4. Third person plural imperative. - 5. Unorthodox Greek. - 6. Concluding remarks. - Pp. 49-50: Appendix: New P. Petr.2 II numbers for papyri discussed above.
CLARYSSE Willy, Linguistic Diversity in the Archive of the Engineers Kleon and Theodoros.
Trevor V. EVANS and Dirk D. OBBINK (Edd.), The Language of the Papyri (Oxford, 2010) pp. 35-50, 3 tabl., 2 figg.
